title: Update failed?????
body:
**UPDATE FAILED**  Unspecified error occurred. Please check te logs for more information. 

   I have uninstalled the game TWICE and reinstalled it, but, it's still telling me the same problem. I don't know what else to do. I have the up to date patch. It is killing me not being able to play my favorite game..._

replies.body:
Patching issues can be caused by a variety of factors, ranging from permissions issues to connection drops to the server. As a first step, I recommend working through our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), as it provides the most common solutions for this issue. 

If you run into patching issues again after trying that guide, please let me know.

I got the same problem too !

Could you take a look of my problem?

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/bnBcyY6k-error

Would appreciate it
